text: thank you for choosing a drive to
Vilnius healthcare
compressor nebulizer and welcome to the
compressor nebulizer operational video
this video is intended as a visual usage
cleaning and maintenance guide and is in
support of the full instruction manual
included with every nebulizer compressor
prior to operation please review the
entire compressor nebulizer instruction
manual that accompanied your unit please
note this product is only to be used by
or on the order of a physician in this
video we will provide an overview of
compressor nebulizer operation assembly
of all parts cleaning and maintenance
when using this electrical product
especially when children are present
always follow the basic safety
instructions referenced in this video
and in the instruction manual included
with your unit a quick reminder this
unit is to be used only as intended as
described in the instruction manual and
is recommended by your provider or
health care professional this part of
the video will provide an overview of
the adult pediatric and portable
compressor nebulizers and is a general
use video this video does not replace
the user instruction manual for your
specific compressor nebulizer place the
compressor nebulizer on a flat stable
surface where you can easily reach the
controls when seated do not use this
device on the floor to operate the
compressor nebulizer please follow these
instructions please ensure that the
power switch is in the off position once
confirmed plug the power cord into an
appropriate electrical wall outlet next
add the prescribed medication to the
nebulizer cup unscrew the cap
pour the medication into the cup then a
fix the cap please be aware that some
nebulizers offer two different nebulizer
cup styles next add the t-connector and
mouthpiece next connect the reservoir
tube and finally connect the other end
of the tubing to the air inlet connector
found at the bottom of the nebulizer cup
then attach the nebulizer cup to the
compressor to begin treatment turn on
the compressor power switch to the eye
position the machine will make a humming
sound and quickly will produce a
medicated missed from the nebulizer
assembly if treatment needs to be
interrupted for any reason please turn
the unit off by simply turning the power
switch to the oposition to resume
treatment turn the unit on by turning
the power switch to the eye position
when treatment is finished turn the
power switch to the oposition to turn it
off and immediately unplug the
compressor nebulizer it is essential to
maintain your unit cleaning the
nebulizer medicine cup assembly after
each treatment warning to prevent
possible risk of infection from
contaminated medication cleaning the
nebulizer is recommended after each
aerosol treatment disinfecting is
recommended once a day to properly clean
your compressor nebulizer please follow
these steps after each use disconnect
the tubing from the air inlet connector
and set aside disassemble the mouthpiece
from the cap and turn the nebulizer cap
counterclockwise to remove the nebulizer
cup wash all items except the tubing in
a hot water and dishwashing detergent
solution
rinse under hot tap water for 30 seconds
to remove detergent residue permit all
parts to air dry each day disinfect the
nebulizer medicine cup assembly except
the tubing by soaking them in three
parts hot water one part white vinegar
for 30 minutes or use a medical
bacterial germicidal disinfectant
available through your provider if using
a medical bacterial germicidal
disinfectant please be sure to follow
the manufacturer's instructions
carefully if using a reusable nebulizer
the assembly may be cleaned daily in the
dishwasher on the top shelf or by
following these cleaning instructions
with clean hands remove the items from
the disinfectant solution rinse under
hot tap water and air-dry on a clean
paper towel store in a sealed bag
caution do not dry nebulizer assembly
part with a cloth towel doing so may
lead to contamination with a damp cloth
wipe the outside of the compressor case
every few days please change the filter
every six months or if the filter does
colors this will keep the compressor
nebulizer operating at peak performance
to change the filter follow these
instructions
remove the filter by grasping the filter
cover firmly and pulling away from the
unit
discard the old filter replace with a
new filter push the new filter into
position replacement filters may be
obtained from your home medical
equipment provider shoulder carry bags
nebulizer masks tubing and additional
reusable or disposable nebulizer kits
are available from a drive to Vilnius
participating provider all additional
maintenance must be performed by an
authorized drive to Vilnius service
professional the Limited Liability
warranty for your drive davila bus
compressor nebulizer includes defects
and materials and workmanship for a
period of five years from the original
purchase date thank you for choosing a
drive to build this product for more
information please visit dr medical comm
or contact a drive to vilnius
representative
[Music]
